title: Free 'JavaScript' from Legal Clutches of Oracle, Devs Petition
author: Joab Jackson
description: Despite its minimal involvement in the language, Oracle still owns the JavaScript trademark. Ryan Dahl and other JS stewards are asking the company to relinquish the name to the public domain.
cntitle: 开发者请愿，让“JavaScript”摆脱 Oracle 的法律束缚
cndescription: 尽管 Oracle 在该语言中参与度很低，但它仍然拥有 JavaScript 商标。Ryan Dahl 和其他 JS 管理员要求该公司将该名称转让给公共领域。
